name: DeleteSlices
label: Delete Slices
description: Delete slices, including associated tilt angles, from a dataset

parameters.name: firstSlice
parameters.label: First Slice
parameters.description: The first slice in the slice range (inclusive)

parameters.name: lastSlice
parameters.label: Last Slice
parameters.description: The last slice in the slice range (inclusive)

parameters.name: axis
parameters.label: Axis
parameters.description: Axis along which to delete slices
